title: MineOnlium
author: MineOnlium
content: This project was started with the vision of a truly fair start crypto-economy. Too many fake projects are popping up all over the place. Let's Mine On!SpecificationsAlgorithm: EthHashBlock time: 15 Seconds Difficulty auto adjusts to stay within range of block time.Block Reward is 2 Coins per block, with an infinite cap on coins. 11,520 coins generated per day.Solo mining guide: https://github.com/JeffNeff/mineonlium/blob/main/Solo-Node-Guide.md,Solo mining quick-start kit (to be replaced soon, it has some issues on windows): https://github.com/JeffNeff/Mineonlium-Solo-Node-QuickstartNetwork/Pool stats -> http://34.132.68.218:4000/api/pools/mineonlium(beta) MoUniSwap (uniswap v3 fork) -> https://mouniswap-lpgecodxeq-uc.a.run.app/#/swapERC20 token generator -> https://moerctokengen-lpgecodxeq-uc.a.run.app/WMO contract address -> 0x92f946D70D999388f8fC17ACa81E9c5d925C89fCTwitter: https://twitter.com/MineOnliumDiscord: https://discord.gg/Ae6UwGJ4Metamask InformationNetwork Name: MineOnlium RPC Server: http://34.87.231.138:8545/Chain ID: 54321 Currency Symbol: MO Block Explorer URL: http://134.215.244.171/dashboardIf you have any questions, or want to know more please join our discord and become a part of the future of mineable coins!

comments.author: MineOnlium
comments.body: Just to clarify, I am a community member. I am not associated with the team of MineOnlium. Just spreading the good news.

comments.author: MineOnlium
comments.body: If anyone has any questions about MineOnlium. I will be happy to answer them. Thank you for your time guys, and much appreciation to the people that have joined our discord since this post went live. We appreciate you all.

comments.author: MineOnlium
comments.body: Quote from: repbaza on October 19, 2022, 01:10:07 AMRU telegram channel:https://t.me/MineOnliumThis is not a legitimate channel for MineOnlium.

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: How long does it take for the pool to disburse miners?

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: Quote from: MineOnlium on October 19, 2022, 01:13:26 PMThis is not a legitimate channel for MineOnlium.Do you have an official channel on Telegram? If not, it's good to make it clear so that no one is harmed.

comments.author: MineOnlium
comments.body: https://t.me/MineOnliumOfficial is the official telegram channel. This was freshly created today for our community. Pool payouts are being handled on a manual 24 hour post hashrate payout basis. The best way to obtain the coin currently is by setting up a mine and solo mining. We can help you in the discord get this node setup.

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: Quote from: MineOnlium on October 19, 2022, 08:47:21 PMhttps://t.me/MineOnliumOfficial is the official telegram channel. This was freshly created today for our community. Pool payouts are being handled on a manual 24 hour post hashrate payout basis. The best way to obtain the coin currently is by setting up a mine and solo mining. We can help you in the discord get this node setup. For some reason, I cannot access the Discord channel and reply. I have been mining for 1.5 days and was not paid out on the last manual payout. My wallet address is 0x8156ab7cBf2faF64bB994B6CA5039FE54Ba6Fcf5. Your help is appreciated.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: MineOnlium on October 19, 2022, 12:30:28 PMIf anyone has any questions about MineOnlium. I will be happy to answer them. Thank you for your time guys, and much appreciation to the people that have joined our discord since this post went live. We appreciate you all.Do they have official website for this project? Because a serious platform will create one.Not all people would want to join discord or any other social media channel.Most of the time, they want to check the background of the project by checking the official site. This may not be a fake project, but what is the chance that this won't survive long just like thousands of alts that are long forgotten already?What do you think would be the use case of this coin that will give life to its trading market?

comments.author: MineOnlium
comments.body: Official Website is in the works. We have the domain name but it’s not ready for prime time. Message me your discord ID and I will send you an invite. https://discord.gg/MmDQ8XXm is the discord link. If that doesn’t work let me know. We have a lot of plans for utility and use case in the works. We already have the ecosystem in place, we are just in the process of building it. Come join the discord and talk to one of us on voice or in general. We’d love to tell you more about why there’s a fun project here. Thank you guys, and we appreciate all the recent community members that have joined.

comments.author: Vladimir_P
comments.body: At the moment, the project is in the initial stage. the developers and the team are always in touch. the team is actually international from all corners of the globe. Although this project started on the ETH algorithm, it will actually fork to another POW/POS algorithm. this will interest investors and miners. mining is available right now.Pool from developers http://mineonpool.com / , stratum+tcp://35.188.100.180:4073this pool is working properly. do not look at the errors in the description - we will fix everything in the near future.another third-party poolmining4people.com - for example - fi.mining4people.com:4074join us, it will be something different from all other projectshttps://discord.gg/RAft7JgB

comments.author: MineOnlium
comments.body: As Vladimir mentioned in the prior post. We will be forking to the best possible algorithm we can find for fair mining that has the most features baked in. We will be building on top of the chain that we choose. This is not just a fork, this is the beginning of something new. We are excited about our future plans.

comments.author: Vladimir_P
comments.body: A Russian pool appeared. who is on the other side of the globe, connect.http://www.mineonlium.ru/stratum+tcp://mineonlium.ru:4073   GPU Miningstratum+tcp://mineonlium.ru:4073   High-End Multi GPU Mining

comments.author: MineOnlium
comments.body: We will be releasing an official roadmap within the coming days for MineOnlium 2.0. We have decided to remain on Ethhash, but we are going to try to build something on top of the chain that has not been done with this algorithm before. We would like to implement Solo mining as a priority, and we have a plan to stop major hashrate from reaping all of the rewards. We at MineOnlium believe in a fairly mined coin for all, regardless of hashrate. In the original vision of Satoshi Nakamoto... "One CPU, One Vote.", but in this case we would be using GPU's. We also plan to implement node rewards for our validators in addition to proof of work. A community voting protocol is planned. At the end of the day, a coin is nothing without its community. Regardless of bull or bear, MineOnlium is here for its miners. We will also be developing a simple GUI node setup program combined with a miner to make mining accessible for all. This is just a sneak peek of things to come.
